lyrics.text: First listen and then answer the question. What was Sweet as Honey and why?
lyrics.translation: 首先听录音，然后回答问题。为什么说“甜如蜜”？

lyrics.text: In 1963, a Lancaster bomber crashed on Wallace Island, a remote place in the South Pacific, a long way west of Samoa.
lyrics.translation: 在1963年，一架兰开斯特轰炸机在南太平洋的一个偏远地方，萨摩亚西边很远的华莱士岛上坠毁了。

lyrics.text: The plane wasn't too badly damaged, but over the years the crash was forgotten and the wreck remained undisturbed.
lyrics.translation: 飞机的损坏并不严重，但随着时间的推移，这次坠机事件被遗忘了，飞机残骸也一直保持着未被打扰的状态。

lyrics.text: Then in 1989, 26 years after the crash, the plane was accidentally rediscovered in an aerial survey of the island.
lyrics.translation: 然后，在1989年，也就是坠机事件发生26年后，飞机在对该岛进行空中调查时意外地被重新发现。

lyrics.text: By this time, a Lancaster bomber in reasonable condition was rare and worth rescuing.
lyrics.translation: 到这个时候，一架状况良好的兰开斯特轰炸机已经很罕见，值得去营救。

lyrics.text: The French authorities had the plane packaged and moved in parts back to France.
lyrics.translation: 法国当局将飞机分拆包装，然后运回法国。

lyrics.text: Now a group of enthusiasts are going to have the plane restored.
lyrics.translation: 现在一群热心人士打算修复这架飞机。

lyrics.text: It has four Rolls Royce Merlin engines, but the group will need to have only three of them rebuilt.
lyrics.translation: 它有四个劳斯莱斯梅林发动机，但该小组只需要重建其中的三个。

lyrics.text: Imagine their surprise and delight when they broke open the packing cases and found that the fourth engine was Sweet as Honey, still in perfect condition.
lyrics.translation: 想象一下，当他们打开包装箱，发现第四个引擎是甜如蜜，仍然处于完美状态时，他们的惊讶和喜悦。

lyrics.text: A colony of bees had turned the engine into a hive and it was totally preserved in beeswax.
lyrics.translation: 一群蜜蜂将引擎变成了蜂巢，它被完全保存在蜂蜡中。
